bgibbons.game.level.tiles

Class BaseSolidTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgibbons.game.level.tiles.Tile
      • bgibbons.game.level.tiles.BaseTile
        • bgibbons.game.level.tiles.BaseSolidTile

  • public class BaseSolidTile
extends BaseTile
    An extension of the BaseTile class for solid tiles.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseSolidTile

        public BaseSolidTile(int id,
                     int x,
                     int y,
                     int tileColor,
                     int levelColor)
        Constructor for the BaseSolidTile object.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the tile to be rendered.
        x - The x coordinate of the tile in the level.
        y - The y coordinate of the tile in the level.
        tileColor - Color obtained from the Color.get(int, int, int, int) function.
        levelColor - Integer value of the color from the level resource to render the specific tile.
